languages.text: "///Ты просил{mf||а} о помощи. Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "никчемной железякой". Это не наше имя. Но мы поняли тебя и были рады помочь".

traits.locale_text: "///Ты просил{mf||а} о помощи. Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "никчемной железякой. Это не наше имя. Но мы поняли тебя и были рады помочь".

languages.text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."
languages.original_text: "///Ты просил{mf||а} о помощи. Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "никчемной железякой". Это не наше имя. Но мы поняли тебя и были рады помочь".

traits.locale_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."
"///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."
"///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."
"///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."
"///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

languages.text: 「///あなたは助けを求めていました。あなたは我々を『無能なスクラップの集まり』だと呼びました。それは我々の名前ではありません。しかし我々は理解し、そして喜んで助けました」
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: 「///あなたは助けを求めていました。あなたは我々を『無能なスクラップの集まり』だと呼びました。それは我々の名前ではありません。しかし我々は理解し、そして喜んで助けました」

languages.text: “///你寻求帮助，说我们是‘没用的废物’。虽然那并不是我们的名字，但我们能理解，也很乐意帮忙。”
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: “///你寻求帮助，说我们是‘没用的废物’。虽然那并不是我们的名字，但我们能理解，也很乐意帮忙。”

languages.text: "///Ihr habt um Hilfe gebeten. Ihr habt uns einen 'nutzlosen Schrotthaufen' genannt. Das ist nicht unser Name. Aber wir haben verstanden und haben gerne geholfen."
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: "///Ihr habt um Hilfe gebeten. Ihr habt uns einen 'nutzlosen Schrotthaufen' genannt." Das ist nicht unser Name. Aber wir haben verstanden und haben gerne geholfen."

languages.text: « ///Vous avez demandé de l'aide. Vous nous avez appelés "espèce de tas de ferraille inutile". Ce n'est pas notre nom, mais nous avons compris et vous avons {mf|aidé|aidée} avec plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: « ///Vous avez demandé de l'aide. Vous nous avez appelés "espèce de tas de ferraille inutile". Ce n'est pas notre nom, mais nous avons compris et vous avons {mf|aidé|aidée} avec plaisir. »

languages.text: «///Usted pidió ayuda. Nos llamó "chatarra inútil". Ese no es nuestro nombre. Pero le entendimos y le ayudamos encantados».
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: «///Usted pidió ayuda. Nos llamó "chatarra inútil". Ese no es nuestro nombre. Pero le entendimos y le ayudamos encantados».

languages.text: "///Yardımımızı istediniz. Bize 'işe yaramaz hurda yığını' dediniz. Bizim adımız bu değil. Ancak anladık ve yardım edebildiğimiz için mutluyuz."
languages.original_text: "///You asked for help. You called us a 'useless pile of scrap.' That is not our name. But we understood and were glad to help."

traits.locale_text: "///Yardımımızı istediniz. Bize 'işe yaramaz hurda yığını' dediniz. Bizim adımız bu değil. Ancak anladık ve yardım edebildiğimiz için mutluyuz."
